meanings.definition: An exclamation of sorrow or regret.
meanings.sent1: Welladay! I forgot my lunch at home.
meanings.sent2: Welladay, the cake I baked burned in the oven.
meanings.sent3: Welladay, I missed the bus again!
meanings.sent4: Welladay, like a lone wolf howling at the moon.
meanings.sent5: Welladay, the news of his departure hit me hard.

meanings.definition: Used to express surprise or disappointment.
meanings.sent1: Oh welladay, I didn't expect that plot twist!
meanings.sent2: Welladay, the concert got canceled last minute.
meanings.sent3: Welladay, the cat knocked over the vase again!
meanings.sent4: Welladay, like a sudden storm on a sunny day.
meanings.sent5: Welladay, her reaction was beyond my imagination.

meanings.definition: A word used to convey a sense of nostalgia or longing.
meanings.sent1: The old photo brought a welladay for the good old days.
meanings.sent2: Welladay, the smell of fresh bread reminds me of home.
meanings.sent3: Welladay, I wish I could go back to those carefree times.
meanings.sent4: Welladay, like a distant melody echoing in my heart.
meanings.sent5: Welladay, the memories of childhood are bittersweet.
